Label: OGDH complex
Comment: Catalyzes the conversion of 2-oxoglutarate into succinyl-CoA.

Label: CSY
Comment: Catalyzes the conversion of Acetyl-CoA to Citric acid.

Label: SDH complex
Comment: Catalyzes the conversion of Succinate to Fumaric acid.

Label: SCS dimer
Comment: Catalyzes the conversion of Succinyl-CoA to Succinate.

Label: (decarboxylating)
Comment: Catalyzes the conversion of (S)-malate to pyruvate.

Label: (LOC_Os03g21950.1)
Comment: Catalyzes the convertion of fumaric acid into malate.

Label: IDH (NAD) complex
Comment: Catalyzes the conversion from isocitrate to 2-oxoglutarate.
